summary.span: 表示 控件中的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上，则访问通过属性。On the , you access the through the property. 使用标准和操作集合的方法。The uses standard and methods to manipulate the collection. 使用方法，以确定集合中是否存在某个特定属性值。Use the method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection. 此外，使用方法来确定的任何索引集合中的对象。Additionally, use the method to determine the index of any object within the collection. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到添加之前对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当添加一个空使用一个有效值到集合中，为你自动生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常具有重复的对象值到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例打印每个信息在。The following code example prints information about each in a .
